author: The Linux Foundation
description:
Swapnil Bhartiya as he sits down with Brian Douglas, Director of Ecosystem at CNCF, at KubeCon London. Get exclusive insights into how major enterprises like Bloomberg, Intuit, and NatWest Bank are actually implementing Kubernetes and cloud-native technologies in production.
In this revealing interview, Brian shares: 
🔹 Real-world use cases from Fortune 500 companies 
🔹 How platform engineering is standardizing cloud deployments 
🔹 Why 99.9% uptime is now the minimum standard 
🔹 The emerging role of AI in cloud-native infrastructure 
🔹 How organizations are tackling the 5% GPU utilization problem 
🔹 Security strategies that actually work in production 
🔹 Resources available for teams looking to level up their Kubernetes skills
Whether you're a developer, platform engineer, or IT leader, this interview provides actionable insights into the current state of cloud-native adoption and what's coming next.
Hashtags: #Kubernetes #CloudNative #CNCF #KubeCon #PlatformEngineering #DevOps #Linux
title: How End Users Are Really Using Kubernetes in 2025: Insights from CNCF's Director of Ecosystem
